department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Boddhisatva of Infinite Mercy, choosing to stay among suffering beings, relieving their misery.  Associated with the Amitabha aspect of Buddha, and wears a small figure of Amitabha wound into his hair.
dimension: H.15-1/2 x W.9 in., on base
title: Avalokiteshvara Head
